auth.loginError: Failed to login. Please try again.
auth.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this page.
auth.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. Please sign in with Discord to continue.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.selectServer: Please select a guild or click Setup to start.
dashboard.description: Albion Raid Manager helps you organize and manage your guild activities, track member participation, and schedule raids.

create.title: Create New Raid
create.description: Schedule and organize your guild's next adventure
create.raidTitlePlaceholder: Enter a compelling title for your raid...
create.raidTitleDescription: Choose a clear, descriptive title that will attract participants
create.contentTypeDescription: Choose the type of content this raid will focus on
create.startDateTimeDescription: Select the start time for your raid
create.locationDescription: Where will the raid take place? This is optional and can be added later.
create.raidDescriptionPlaceholder: Provide detailed information about the raid objectives, requirements, and what participants can expect...
create.raidDescriptionDescription: Include objectives, requirements, loot rules, and any special instructions
create.successDescription: Your raid has been scheduled but is not yet visible to participants.

details.noDescription: No description provided - click to add
details.exportSuccessDescription: The raid configuration has been downloaded as a JSON file.

actions.title: Raid Management
actions.raidCancelledDescription: This raid has been cancelled and is no longer available for management.
actions.raidCancelledNote: Cancelled raids cannot be reopened or modified
actions.raidCompletedDescription: This raid has been finished successfully.
actions.raidCompletedNote: Completed raids are read-only and cannot be modified
actions.openRaidDescription: Allow players to join the raid and fill available slots.
actions.closeRaidDescription: Stop new players from joining while keeping current participants.
actions.startRaidDescription: Mark the raid as currently in progress and notify all participants.
actions.finishRaidDescription: Complete the raid and mark it as finished for all participants.
actions.confirmCancel:
Are you sure you want to cancel the raid "{{title}}"?

This action cannot be undone and all participants will be notified.
actions.configurationDescription: Import a raid configuration from another raid of the same content type. This will replace the current raid's description, notes, location, and slot composition.
actions.dangerDescription: Permanently cancel this raid and notify all participants. This action cannot be undone and will remove the raid from all participants' views.

notes.title: Raid Notes
notes.noNotesDescription: Add notes to keep track of important information about this raid.

composition.title: Raid Composition
composition.editWarning: Raid composition can only be edited when the raid is in SCHEDULED, OPEN, or CLOSED status.
composition.addSlotDescription: Create a new slot for your raid composition
composition.slotNameDescription: A descriptive name for this slot (e.g., "Main Tank", "Healer 1")
composition.roleDescription: Choose the primary role for this slot
composition.memberDescription: Assign a specific member to this slot
composition.weaponDescription: Search and select a weapon from the Albion Online database.
composition.commentDescription: Add any special requirements or notes for this slot

itemPicker.title: Select Item
itemPicker.description: Search and select an item from the Albion Online database.
itemPicker.searchError: Failed to search items. Please try again.
itemPicker.searchTips: Search and select a weapon from the Albion Online database.
itemPicker.tierPattern: Specify the tier using the game pattern (e.g.: "T8", "8.", "8.1").

servers.title: Servers
servers.noServersDescription: You don't have any servers configured yet. Make sure you are a server administrator and try again.
servers.loadError: Failed to load servers. Please try again later.

forms.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
forms.maxLength: Must be no more than {{count}} characters

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed. Please log in again.
errors.badRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again.
errors.internalServerError: Internal server error. Please try again later.
errors.notAuthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.serverVerificationFailed: Server verification failed. Please make sure the bot is properly invited and try again.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

serverInfo.description: This server will be added to your account once you complete the setup process.

discordInvite.description: Click the link below to open Discord and accept the bot invitation to your server.
discordInvite.permissionsWarning: Make sure you have admin permissions on the server before accepting the invitation.

verification.loading: Please wait while we verify your server...

complete.message: Verification complete. You will be redirected to the dashboard page. Please

import.title: Import Raid Configuration
import.dragDropSubtext: Drag & drop a JSON file or click to browse
import.importingDescription: Please wait while we apply the configuration
import.importDisabled: Import is disabled for this raid status
import.invalidFileTypeDescription: Please drop a JSON configuration file.
import.invalidConfigurationDescription: The file format is not valid.
import.configurationParseError: The configuration could not be parsed.
import.contentTypeMismatchDescription: This configuration is for {{configType}} raids, but this raid is {{raidType}}.

inlineEdit.saveHint: Press Ctrl+Enter to save, Escape to cancel

raidSlot.noSlotsFlexDescription: This flexible raid doesn't have any slots defined yet. Add slots to organize your raid composition.
raidSlot.noSlotsFixedDescription: This fixed raid doesn't have any slots defined yet.

raid.statusUpdateErrorDescription: There was an error updating the raid status. Please try again.
raid.notesUpdateErrorDescription: There was an error updating the raid notes. Please try again.
raid.updatedDescription: Your raid details have been updated.
raid.updateErrorDescription: There was an error updating the raid. Please try again.
raid.deleteErrorDescription: There was an error deleting the raid. Please try again.

slot.createErrorDescription: There was an error creating the slot. Please try again.
slot.deleteErrorDescription: There was an error deleting the slot. Please try again.
slot.updateErrorDescription: There was an error updating the slot. Please try again.
slot.cannotEditDescription: Raid composition can only be edited when the raid is in SCHEDULED, OPEN, or CLOSED status.
slot.cannotAddDescription: Cannot add more slots. Maximum party size reached or raid is not editable.
slot.cannotDeleteDescription: Cannot delete slots. Minimum party size reached or raid is not editable.
slot.cannotReorderDescription: Raid composition can only be edited when the raid is in SCHEDULED, OPEN, or CLOSED status.

auth.failedDescription: No authorization code received from Discord. Please try again.
auth.failedCallbackDescription: Unable to complete Discord authentication. Please try again.

raids.loadErrorDescription: There was an error loading raids. Please try again.

confirmations.deleteRaid: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.deleteSlot: Are you sure you want to delete this slot?

SOLO_DUNGEON.description: Solo dungeon clearing for farming and loot

OPEN_WORLD_FARMING.description: Open world farming and resource gathering activities

GROUP_DUNGEON.description: Small group dungeon content for 2-5 players

ROADS_OF_AVALON.description: Roads of Avalon content with fights and/or golden chests

DEPTHS_DUO.description: Corrupted Dungeons duo content for 2 players

DEPTHS_TRIO.description: Corrupted Dungeons trio content for 3 players

OPEN_WORLD_GANKING.description: Open world ganking and PvP activities

FIGHTING_SQUAD.description: Organized fighting squad for PvP content

ZVZ_CALL_TO_ARMS.description: Zone vs Zone large-scale PvP content
